title: Karim AI
text: I am a Senior Lecturer (Associate Professor) in Statistics in the Department of Mathematical Sciences at the University of Bath. I was research fellow at the Department of Statistics in the Open University in Milton Keynes and then Lecturer in Medical Statistics within the Tropical Epidemiology Group based at the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine before coming to the University of Bath in September 2013.

title: Karim AI
text: I am a Senior Lecturer (Associate Professor) in Statistics in the Department of Mathematical Sciences at the University of Bath. I was research fellow at the Department of Statistics in the Open University in Milton Keynes and then Lecturer in Medical Statistics within the Tropical Epidemiology Group based at the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine before coming to the University of Bath in September 2013.

title: Karim AI
text:
Education

PhD in Statistics, 2006. National University of Mexico
MSc in Statistics, 2001. National University of Mexico
BSc in Acturial Sciences, 2000. ITAM Mexico

title: Karim AI
text:
Experience

LSHTM. Lecturer in Medical Statistics 2011-2013
Postdoctoral research fewllow. Open University 2005-2011
